title: 循环and输入
text: #2-input&循环while ####（1）input / raw_input—键入 SublimeText不能运行输入操作，且Python2中输入为方法raw_input()，Python3中修改为input()。 输入的值为字符串，需要用int()获取输入int数值 age = raw_input(“How old are you? “)if int(age) >= 24: print(“Oh,no,you are not young now! you are forbiden to play it .”)else: print(“qxd’s age is “ + age + “,and you can do it”) ####（2）求模运算%—两数相除，取余数 ‘’’奇数偶数判定’’number = input(“Enter a number and I will tell you if it is even or odd:”)if int(number) % 2 == 0: print(“The number “ + number +” is a even.”)else: print(“The number” + number + “ is a odd.”)
